meanings.definition: One who emblazons or adorns with prominent markings or symbols.
meanings.sent1: The emblazoner carefully painted intricate designs on the shield.
meanings.sent2: The emblazoner added colorful patterns to the banner.
meanings.sent3: The emblazoner's cat walked around proudly with a tiny painted crown on its head.
meanings.sent4: The emblazoner of the family, she brought life to every dull surface she touched.
meanings.sent5: The emblazoner's work stood out, capturing everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: To emblazon or decorate with prominent markings or symbols.
